title: Mood Stabilizers for BPD
itunes:title: Mood Stabilizers for BPD
description:
Are mood stabilizers effective for borderline personality disorder? This episode discusses the use of lamotrigine and lithium in BPD patients, including possible benefits, concerns, and recommendations regarding these medications. 

Faculty: Paul Links, M.D. 
Host: Jessica Diaz, M.D.
